data.title: Fujitsu & Copaco expand partnership
data.meta_description: Fujitsu and Copaco recently announced a new partnership. This aims to expand Fujitsu’s reach in the Netherlands and provide more efficient and effective ICT solutions to customers in the region…
data.text:
Fujitsu and Copaco recently announced a new partnership. This aims to expand Fujitsu’s reach in the Netherlands and provide more efficient and effective ICT solutions to customers in the region.

Fujitsu is known for its high-quality products and innovative solutions, offering a wide range of personal computers, servers, storage systems, software, consulting, and outsourcing services. Copaco is a leading distributor of ICT products and services in the Netherlands, providing a broad range of hardware, software, and cloud solutions to customers in various industries.

The partnership between Fujitsu and Copaco will combine the strengths of both companies, providing customers with high-quality ICT solutions that meet their specific needs. The partnership will focus on delivering solutions that help customers optimize their IT infrastructure, improve their business processes, and enhance their competitiveness.

One of the significant benefits of the partnership is that customers will have access to a broader range of Fujitsu products and services through Copaco’s extensive network. This will include Fujitsu’s advanced hardware and software solutions, as well as its consulting and outsourcing services. Customers will also benefit from Copaco’s expertise and support, which will help them implement and maintain Fujitsu solutions more effectively.

But the partnership doesn’t just aim to provide better technology solutions. Both Fujitsu and Copaco are also committed to creating a more sustainable future through their efforts. Fujitsu, for example, has set ambitious targets for reducing its carbon footprint, with a goal of achieving net-zero emissions by 2050. The company has also been recognized for its efforts in sustainable technology, with its LIFEBOOK U9311 recently receiving the ENERGY STAR® certification.

Similarly, Copaco has been working to reduce its environmental impact, with a focus on reducing its carbon footprint and waste generation. The company has implemented various measures, such as using renewable energy sources and reducing packaging waste, to achieve its sustainability goals.

Through their partnership, Fujitsu and Copaco are committed to delivering more sustainable solutions to their customers. This includes solutions that help customers reduce their environmental impact, such as energy-efficient hardware and software solutions. Additionally, the partnership aims to help customers achieve their sustainability goals by providing solutions that enable them to reduce waste and use renewable energy sources.
